thread.title: U.S. Government Bonds Gain, With Higher Yields Attracting Investors

author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Government Bonds Gain, With Higher Yields Attracting Investors
text:
U.S. government bonds strengthened Monday as yields near multiyear highs attracted investors to the debt.
The yield on the benchmark Treasury 10-year note fell for a third-consecutive day, settling as 2.862% from 2.871% Friday. Yields fall as bond prices rise.
This yearâ€™s rapid rise has prompted speculation that the 10-year yield is headed...
